name: Doug House
text: Prompt response to a question after the sale.

name: Tamara Fox
text: Great company to work with! Their customer service is outstanding and I love my Kinetico water softener and reverse osmosis drinking water!

resp.text: We are so excited to hear that you love your Kinetico water softener and reverse osmosis drinking water! We appreciate your business.

name: Blanca Perez
text: Austin was very professional and knowledgeable.  Very happy with his help.

resp.text: Blanca, It's great to hear you had a five-star experience working with Austin. Thank you for your honest review.

name: Sharon Mattox
text: Very nice young man, seemed genuinely concerned and made sure the issue was completely taken care of. We’ve been Aon customers for several years and the service has always been excellent! Every home needs this product. In addition to our whole house system we have the drinking water in our kitchen. Be careful it  will make you a “water snob”.⚠️⚠️

name: Grant Wince
text: We received a great product in the Kinetico Water softening system and RO drinking water systems that we had installed recently by Austin. We appreciated the great communication and the efficient and friendly service that was provided and would recommend AON to anyone who wants a better experience with their water for the family.

name: Rampage
text: Long and dependable service. They won’t sell you a system and forget about you. I’ve used them for six years with no issue. Have a whole house filter, water softener and a 24” UV light from them. I never have to ask them for a filter and they show up every year to maintain my system.

name: Kayleen Ridgeway
text: Aon water technology was very friendly both on the phone and at service. We have a kinetico water softener and a K5 RO. The serviceman was very knowledgeable and polite. I highly recommend them for anyone that is looking for a water softener and Reverse osmosis system.

name: Patrick Dierks
text:
Anyone can sell water softener systems.   I chose AON over their competition, not because their system was far superior to others, but rather for the simple reason they went to great lengths to explain how the system would be installed.

Also understanding that they are a plumbing business first, and a water softener supplier second, gave me the reassurance the job would be done right and to my complete satisfaction.   Not only has the system perform flawlessly, I also killed two birds with one stone when they installed the loop system with my exterior main water line.  They were able to remove a "frozen/corroded " flow valve outside and replace it with a ball valve, mounted on the inside of the house, which sits right next to my system for easy access.

I'm hoping this review helps other folks that are stratling the fence.  Randy and his installation crew are top notch.

name: Harley Charley
text: The best water technology company in the Tennessee Valley.  They installed my Kinetco Water Treatment System, which includes a Drinking Water Purification System as well.  I scheduled an annual visit by one of their technicians once a year to test the system and change all filters.  The system works flawlessly.  Great system, company, and customer support.

name: Loftin Shanda
text: Tech and sales associates were extremely courteous and informative as I consider replacing 15 yr+ softener system in my recently purchased home. They weren’t pushy but willing to answer all my questions regarding costs, benifits and routine maintenance requirements. Look forward to dealing with them In the future. Thank you, again, for your service call.

name: Bonnie Whitt
text: Aon Water Technolgy gets FIVE stars! I plan to use them again in our next house! Very professional and highly knowledgeable. I highly recommend!

name: CocoaBarnett
text: Great experience!  Thank you!

name: Sonny Batchelor
text: Tim did a good job of servicing my equipment. He explained to me what they were doing and what they were test.

name: James Guillemette
text:
I've been a customer for approx. 2 years now.  Overall, very good product and I'm happy with the product.  Customer service is sometimes excellent and sometimes poor.

Pro: AON's water softener is a very good product.  They bent over backwards to send a guy over to defrost my outside pipes in the middle of a Winter freeze!

Con:  The whole-house water softener developed a leak after 18 months and the top part of the valve unit had a recall and required service.  They were not able to schedule the repair for nearly a month due to company manpower issues.  Parts were covered but labor was not.  AON charged more per hour than my local HVAC and autobody shops at $112 per hour.  Their service techs did a good job repairing my softener, but broke all the pipe half clamps that secure the pipes to the wall, and did not replace them.  ($2.50 worth of clamps - should have replaced them)!

name: Amy Word
text: Great customer service! Highly recommend!

name: Stephen Kornoelje
text: Service is always prompt and thorough. Thanks for the help as always!

name: David Bumgardner
text: Good people, good products

resp.text: David, Glad you hear you like our products! We appreciate your business.

name: Keith Jones
text: Prompt friendly service

name: Karen Brian
text: Culligan of Mobile went out of their way to sanitize my house's plumbing system after a water test showed positive for Mycobacterium Avium. They also placed an ultraviolet system on my main water supply. Subsequent tests have come back negative for the bacteria. They are life-savers. I can't thank them enough for all their help and consideration. They are truly professionals and extremely knowledgeable in this area. Kudos to you Culligan!

name: Toya Coverson
text: They have delicious clean tasting water. Excellent customer service and contact free delivery. Just put the bottles by the front door and they replace them. I don't have a lot of strength,  so I opted for the 3 gallon bottles and the bottom feeder dispenser. Very stylish and simple to use

resp.text: Hi Toya, thank you so much for taking the time to write a review on Google! I am so happy to hear that you are satisfied with our customer service and our bottled water.  The bottom loader dispensers are awesome because you don't have to lift those heavy bottles! We appreciate your business with us and hope you have a great weekend!

name: MJ Chamblin
text: Great price for great tasting water! They were super helpful when I signed up for delivery and always deliver on time.

name: Rupert Ward,Jr.
text: PMS is on point that brings great water throughout my whole home. Investing in Culligan has been the best and thank you for keeping safety 1st....#ALREADY!!

resp.text: Hello Rupert! Thank you so much for positive review on Google! We are so pleased to hear that you are happy with our service and that you now have great water in your home! We strive here for great service and the safety of our customers and employees always. We appreciate your business with us and hope you have a great rest of your week!

name: Pia Lee
text: Getting great water delivered right to your home is such a great convenience. Getting it from a great company like Culligan is amazing. Customer service is spot on, always friendly, always prompt.  My delivery man is courteous and professional.  We drink a lot of water in our house, Culligan makes is affordable and earth friendly.

resp.text: Hi Pia! Thank you so much for taking the time to write this amazing review! I would love to share this on our Facebook page, if that is OK with you.  We truly appreciate you explaining your positive experience with Culligan. Thanks again, and hope you have a fantastic weekend!

name: Tosha Capell
text: I called on a Monday and set up new services I was told that by Tuesday no later than Wednesday I would have my bottles. Here it is today is Thursday and I’m being told they are too busy I can leave a message. Well I the message I left was to cancel my order.  Their customer service is horrible.

name: Emily Chinal
text: Googled for home water delivery of spring water. Found them and they deliver to my remote area. Great customer service and auto pay available. Guy delivered on the first as stated. Great tasting spring water. Awesome! Very pleased!

resp.text: Hello Emily, thank you so much for rating us on Google! We are so happy to hear that you are enjoying our Spring Water. We appreciate your business with us and hope you have a fantastic week!

name: Theron Adams
text: We've been in our house 13 years, and Culligan has been with us from the beginning. Our water is crystal clear and tastes delicious. Stop buying all the plastic bottles and save the planet. Get Culligan.

resp.text: Hello Theron, thank you so much for this wonderful review!  We are so pleased to hear that your water tastes delicious, and that you are happy with the quality of water.  Hope you have a fantastic weekend!

name: Rick Hurst
text: Excellent service!

resp.text: Hi Rick! Thank you so much for rating us 5-stars on Google. We appreciate the positive feedback and hope you have a great rest of your week!

name: Janna Perry
text: We have had water delivery for a few years now.  We love the water & have had very few problems over the years, but anytime there has been any issue, the nice people at Culligan have handled it quickly and efficiently.

resp.text: Hello Janna, thank you so much for this amazing review! We strive here at Culligan to provide our customers with the best customer experience. Thank you again so much for sharing and have a fantastic day!

name: Timothy Toomey
text: Our patients love having Culligan Water in all of our Gulf Coast waiting rooms!

resp.text: Hello Timothy! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with Culligan Water. We are so pleased to hear that your patients love our water!

name: maryann jeeves
text: Wonderful service! And great products!

resp.text: Hello Maryann, thank you so much for taking the time to rate us on Google! We appreciate the kind words and love to hear that you are happy with our service. Have a fantastic day!

name: Liss
text: Service is great! The water tastes great and the price is excellent.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for sharing this review with our dealership! Along with reliable products and quality water, we take pride in providing professional, convenient and friendly service to all customers, so we're happy to hear about your positive experience. Please let us know if there's anything we can help you with in the future. Thanks again.

Best,

Tim St. Gelais
General Manager of Culligan of Mobile
tim.stgelais@fortwaltonculligan.com
(850) 664-7771

name: Mel Blue
text: Great service and customer service.

resp.text: Hello Mel! Thank you so much for providing us a review and for the kind words.  We love to hear that you are satisfied with our customer service and service work. Here at Culligan, we strive to provide our customers with great customer service and exceptional service work done by our trained technicians.  We appreciate your business with us and hope you have a fantastic weekend!

name: Sammie King
text: We love our Culligan Water and our Culligan man!

resp.text: Hi Sammie, thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review of your experience. I am pleased to hear that our team made your experience pleasant and we look forward to seeing you again soon!
